sentences.en: $15 for two beers seems a little excessive.
sentences.cn: 两杯啤酒要15美元，似乎有点过分。

sentences.en: As expected, excessive drinking caught up with him.
sentences.cn: 正如所预料的那样, 过度地饮酒最终毁了他.
医生过度加班却无报酬.

sentences.en: Excessive conformity is usually caused by fear of disapproval.
sentences.cn: 过于墨守成规通常都是由于担心得不到认可。

sentences.en: Excessive dosage of this drug can result in injury to the liver.
sentences.cn: 这种药使用过量会损害肝脏.
饮酒过度会引起酒精中毒.

sentences.en: Excessive drinking is harmful to the health.
He actually knocked himself out with excessive work.
sentences.cn: 实际上他是由于工作过度而把自己累得筋疲力尽的.

sentences.en: Her voice shock with excessive emotion.
sentences.cn: 她的声音因过分激动而颤抖.

sentences.en: Non-fat dairy products supply the needed nutrients without excessive calories.
sentences.cn: 脱脂乳制品能提供身体所需的营养，而不含过多的热量。

sentences.en: She takes an excessive interest in clothes.
The chops should be cooked over moderate heat to prevent excessive charring.
sentences.cn: 肉块应该用文火烹煮，以免烧过了头。

sentences.en: The police vigorously denied that excessive force had been used.
sentences.cn: 警方坚决否认曾经滥用武力。

sentences.en: The prices at this hotel are excessive.
sentences.cn: 这家旅馆的价钱贵得过分.

sentences.en: There are times when the book suffers from excessive authorial control.
sentences.cn: 该书曾几次受到作者过多的制约。

sentences.en: They complained about the excessive noise coming from the upstairs flat.
sentences.cn: 他们抱怨楼上发出的噪音太大。

words.tran_cn: 超过，超额；过度，过量；无节制

phrases.tran_cn: 过剩需求；过量需求；需求过旺
过度噪音；过分的吵闹声

trans.tran_en: much more than is reasonable or necessary
